params.812: Reach level 5 in the Ranged skill.
params.813: Ensure you have a Ranged weapon for your level with usable ammo. Arrows you fire can be picked up from the ground.
params.814: Train your Ranged to level 5 by fighting nearby monsters!|Make sure to equip your armour, bow and arrows.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Men, Chickens and Goblins near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.|Chickens drop raw chicken which can be cooked for food.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.|Arrows you fire can be picked up from the ground.|If you run out of arrows, speak to the Ranged combat instructor south of the general store in Lumbridge.
params.823: Set your combat style to the stance you want.
